thread.title: Mother/son trip
thread.title_full: Mother/son trip - Review of Club Quarters Hotel, Trafalgar Square, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Brandy S
title: Mother/son trip
text: We had a wonderful time visiting London and staying at The Grand at Trafalgar Square. When we arrived mid morning on Friday our room was ready for check-in. The staff at The Grand were helpful and friendly. Our room was kept clean and comfortable for our entire stay. I look forward to returning as a guest in the near future.
